user-prompt-submit.command:
echo '=== CPS Standards Application ===' && cat csp.md 2>/dev/null || echo 'CPS standards: Clean code, Windows deps, proper comments' && echo '
=== Code to fix: $1 ==='
echo '=== CPS Code Review ===' && echo 'Checking code against CPS standards: $1'
mkdir -p debug && echo 'Debug folder created for testing scripts' && ls -la debug 2>/dev/null || dir debug
rm -rf debug/* 2>/dev/null || del /q debug\* && echo 'Debug folder cleaned'
echo '=== Documenting Step ===' && echo 'Step: $1' && echo 'Adding to Isys.md documentation'
echo '=== Windows Dependencies Check ===' && echo 'Checking Windows compatibility for: $1'
echo '=== Clean Code Review ===' && echo 'Applying clean code principles to: $1' && echo 'No patches - full clean implementation'
